commitments.commitment: Starting with the essentials, the event calendar and the Discord bot to get the foundation in place
commitments.quote: We're starting with the essentials, the event calendar and the Discord bot to get the foundation in place.

commitments.commitment: Planning to open source the project later so the community can contribute directly
commitments.quote: We are also planning to open source the project later on so the community can contribute directly.

commitments.commitment: Expand with more educational quests, enhanced incentives and user-driven updates
commitments.quote: Then we'll expand with more educational quests, enhanced incentives and user-driven updates.

open_questions.question: Rules and permissions for adding events to the calendar
open_questions.context: Making event posting as decentralized as possible while maintaining quality

open_questions.question: Which solution to choose for adding events (Discord bot integration, NFTs, AI check system, etc.)
open_questions.context: Multiple options being explored for event submission process
